Hindi Lyrics > A Scandal > Labon Se Following is the lyrics of 'Labon Se' song from hindi movie 'A Scandal'. Song: Labon Se Movie: A Scandal Singer(s): Jubin Nautiyal, Sukriti Kakar Music By: Ikka, Arko, Amjad, Nadeem, Bapi-Tutul Labon Se Lyrics from A Scandal
Dekha hain jab se tujhko lagta hain tab se mujhko Tu mera hi banega baby you belong with me Thodisi bechani hain dil mein halchal machi hain Tujhko hain bas ab paana you fine you mine O ... tu jarasa tu chance lein O ... tu chaahe jo mang lein Labonsein lagale mein pyaas bann jaun teri... haan teri Hoton se lagaale mein jaan bann jaun teri... haan teri Labonsein lagale mein pyaas bann jaun teri... haan teri O ... tu chaahe jo mang lein Labonsein lagale mein pyaas bann jaun teri... haan teri Hoton se lagaale mein jaan bann jaun teri... haan teri Jism ko chaahatein bas teri hi bas teri ho gayi Yeh tune kya kar diya me khud se hi ab kafil ho gaya O ... tu chaahe jo mang lein Labonsein lagale mein pyaas bann jaun teri... haan teri Hoton se lagaale mein jaan bann jaun teri... haan teri Labonsein lagale mein pyaas bann jaun teri... haan teri Furkatein keh rahi tujhe feel karoon teri khushbu chumloon Tujhe chum ke yoon laga mein tujhmein hi khoya hoon kahin O ... tu chaahe jo mang lein Labonsein lagale mein pyaas bann jaun teri... haan teri Hoton se lagaale mein jaan bann jaun teri... haan teri Other 'A Scandal' Songs: 1: Long Night 2: Labon Se Get Weekly Movie Updates Want to suggest any changes to the lyrics of 'Labon Se' from 'A Scandal'?
